name: Putin Destroys Alien
description:
-In an alternative reality where putin have been ruling russia for thoudsands of year. Democratic alien in space are trying to spread fake propaganda to the people and make them betray their great king. You play as" Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin " ,the last heir to the throne of a great reign and the second most powerful being in planet earth(" Second only to obama "), have to do what is right and smite their ass.

- With the advances of new technology in the year 3077, putin decides to merge his muscular body with a spaceship made out of fear itself and launch himself into space, diving straight into the enemies frontline. Destroy everything that is on sight, show them no mercy, enlight aliens the way of communism.

*Feature*
- This game was made to bring back memories of 80s arcade score-attack space shooter with some fun unique mechanics to spice up the battlefield
- Fews of them are:
Collect enough communism spirit points to call in a comrade to help you with the fight
- This fellow comrade will double all of putin's mothership original attribute and gain him god like status for a short period of time

Drinking Habits: After putin turned himself into a spaceship, scientists have realized that the ship energy wasn't functioning normaly like an ordinary spacecraft would with gasoline so they decided to analyze the cause and found out that its now need vodka to run. GRAB THE VODKA!!!!!!!
Combo system : The more enemies you kill, the more likely it is that you will gain an extra power up. 
Score progression system : Every 2500 points you acquired will result in a re-roll to a different bullet type.
